name: Micro Mini Pink Perfection Tweezer Set
about: What it is:A small but mighty set of three classic tweezers in an easy-to-carry, travel-friendly size enclosed in a pink perfection faux-leather pouch.What Else You Need to Know: The Mini Slant Tweezers feature the classic 25u00b0 angled tips for expert brow shaping. Mini Point Tweezer features precision sharp tips for ingrowns, baby-fine hairs, and stubble. The Mini Flat Tweezer features flat stainless-steel tips that work great for removing thicker hairs..This set contains:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To ease tweezing, take a hot shower or use a warm washcloth to open pores. .-Tweeze in the direction of hair growth to avoid breakage. .-To close pores post tweezing, use cold water or astringent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Where are the Sephora MINI tweezers years back?Purchased during the Christmas season. Luv them. Bring those tweezers set back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really cute and portable but after a few uses was so dull and could not get any hairs with ease or accuracy. Atypical for this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: These are soo cute and work well! Very handy to take with me everywhere and it comes with a case!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such an adorable set! Great quality tweezers that are super convenient for on the go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this little setu2026great for traveling & for gifting for friends that travel also.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the price. Go to Walmart
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: $34 for these mini dollar store tweezers? Nicely done Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, but this item is very tiny. I wish it was a little longer for gripping purposes. The brand has always been fabulous and reliable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping these would be good since that brand usually doesnt disappoint but they are pretty much useless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these tweezers are game changers!  they are the best I've ever had.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the size and the different uses you can have with 3 of the tweezers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are super small which makes them great for in my purse. They work just as well the full size. Plus super easy to see because of the bright colour. The case keeps them all safely together too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love Tweezerman, hate these.  Not worth all the effort.  Love the Iittle gold  color ones.  Am returning.

reviews.review_title: A must have for my job!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are extremely small, which is why I love them.  Im a Skin Care Specialist in NJ & work at European Wax Center.  By far my most purchased tweezers.  I literally can not count how many time Ive re-purchased them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When they say MICRO, they MEAN it! These are as long as my pinky! I am a body waxer and wouldn't use these for very long because they would make my hands cramp after awhile, but for beginners and minimal hairs to pull at once, they would be fine! Tweezerman always has good quality tweezers, these are just mega-micro!  Beautiful color - Tweezerman make these in a regular size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect travel set or to try the tweezers out on the cheap. This is NOT for people with some types of hand issues as they are mini sized. After a hand surgery I found them more difficult bc of that. Not an issue for me personally bc I have like 6 pairs now

reviews.review_title: Tiny for travel bag/on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great to pack u2014 same tweezerman quality. I do have full use of my hands and I have small hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great little handy tweezer set!!! Different angles and small size are super convenient

reviews.review_title: Don buy mini Tweezerman, buy the regular size
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tweezerman makes good products but these are actually too small to be of much use. I don't see the point of the mini size. I bought only because I forgot my tweezers on a trip and this was the only size in stock in the store. Buy a large/regular size and skip these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, but not great. Mini size are not easy for aging hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Eh. Theyre tweezers. Theyre tiny. In a pinch I guess they work. Emphasis on pinch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They are very good quality and work well, but for how small all components are its overpriced. Just buy one full size tweezer if you think like me and thought this would be a good value.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it if it was a medium size would have been perfect but they were out  but is small just remember the exact place you place it so u dont lose it lose it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dont even bother wasting money on any other brand. Tweezerman is by far the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I see people complain about how tiny these are but thats what I love about them. I use regular size at home and have these in my purse for emergencies. I dont think theyre meant to be your only set of tweezers. But they are oh so perfectly small to keep in your purse on the go. The little case is magnetized so they dont come out in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tips of each tweezer is really fine & they grip each hair perfectly. I have fairly large & in charge brows, so its nice being able to have such a small tool to use so that I dont make a mistake

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Handles too short for my trip. Seems to break hair off instead of pulling hair out by the root leaving a small piece of hair looking like a black spot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this set, if youre looking for something small and compact to keep in your purse at all times this is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best tweezers ever!! Only complaint is that theyre really small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed, so tiny cannot be gripped right and cramps my hands. Seems like a gag gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Exactly what I imagined, they are micro tweezers so they about about the length of my thumb, so maybe I wouldnt suggest them if you have long nails And if you cut the hair your trying to tweeze,Like mentioned in the other review, try not squeezing so hard. I like them for the variety,  compactness and ease to travel with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the mini tweezerman tweezers (its all that I use) because its easy to use and it gets the job done. I use the mini size because its cheaper than the full size one and maybe even better because I get a good grip. Anyways, I wanted to give this a try... and I did. ended up returning it. The set is SO tiny and it just wasnt the same standard

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The size doesnt bother me - however - they are too sharp and cut any hair I attempt to pluck which entirely defeats the purpose of a set of tweezers. Not at all a product worth purchasing.

reviews.review_title: I want the Sephora Stray Away set back!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like these. Did not work for me at all.  I really miss the   old Sephora Stray Away set.  Those tweezers were the best tweezers! Bring them back please.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this online and didnt realize how tiny they were.  My daughters dolls have accessories this size!  They work well but my hand starts cramping when Im holding them. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a set of travel tweezers to take on vacay and I was excited when I found these. Cute, hot pink and the reliable tweezerman brand that I love. Sadly these do not work as well as the regular sized ones at all,  not even close. I don't know if its because they are just too small to get he same quality??? Save your money and avoid these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are teeny, but I love the case and the fact that there are three different tweezers to choose from, depending on what you need it for. Each one is the length of a regular bobby pin but I dont see it as a negative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm returning these tweezers as I'm writing this review. These tweezers are so sharp that they cut my hairs as I'm trying to pluck them out. They're so overrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING SET! Love the adorable pouch that holds all 3, and  the pointy one is absolutely great, truly handy for pulling out anything tiny. Perfect for ingrown hairs, splinters, and tonight my boyfriend stepped on a tiny piece of broken glass, and there was no better tool than the pointy one and the flan one to pull it out. Excellent little trio.

reviews.review_title: What is this a [tweezer] for ants?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yikes...these are small...like very small. I know they are called micro mini but I was surprised when I got them. They work great but if you take them out of the case they are very easy to lose because they are so tiny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: They are super tiny but they are probably the best tweezers from tweezerman I ever got. I have a regular size one and the Anastasia Beverlyhills tweezer and somehow I keep reaching out to those. Perfect for those stubborn little tiny hairs that nothing else seems to pull out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good and compact. I just purchased it, so I'm very curious to see how the quality will stand to weekly use. Only giving 4 stars because of the excessive single-use packaging, which isn't recyclable. It would be nice to see eco-friendly efforts from Tweezerman and Sephora. Thanks :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It has really helped get every hair around my brows with precision. The idea of having three different kinds is wonderful to get every hair at every angle. The packaging is also super cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kinda disappointed that online it says mini, but on the actual packaging, it says micro mini. Which would've let me know that these are SUPER small from what I imagined. But I guess that's what happens when you buy things online instead of in store. *sigh*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I live and die by Tweezerman products but these aren't worth it. I should've known it too. It's like they're cheaply made which is not how the full size versions are at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tiny but effective. I removed one star for the obnoxious excessive packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone needs a good pair of tweezers and no one makes better ones than Tweezerman. This set is perfect for all of your needs. Its small enough to toss in a purse or makeup bag but the tweezers are large enough to work perfectly without feeling like they are too small. Some minis are too small to be functional but these are not. The little case is gorgeous and functional. It barely takes up any space. This makes a great addition to my Tweezerman collection!
